p.pre:
The following classes from the Cytoscape core contain the string 'CytoscapeWindow'; in most cases this is a programmatic reference to the class. These are the classes that will be modified in the next round.
./AbstractPlugin.java ./CytoscapeConfig.java ./GraphObjAttributes.java ./PluginLoader.java ./cytoscape.java ./browsers/NodeBrowsingMode.java ./data/annotation/AnnotationGui.java ./dialogs/ColorNodesFromFileDialog.java ./dialogs/ColorPopupButton.java ./dialogs/EdgeControlDialog.java ./dialogs/EdgePopupMenu.java ./dialogs/RotateSelectionDialog.java ./dialogs/ShrinkExpandGraph.java ./dialogs/ShrinkExpandGraphUI.java ./jarLoader/JarClassLoader.java ./jarLoader/JarLoaderAction.java ./jarLoader/JarLoaderCommandLineParser.java ./jarLoader/JarLoaderUI.java ./jarLoader/JarPluginDirectoryAction.java ./jarLoader/JarPluginLoaderAction.java ./layout/AttributeLayout.java ./undo/CytoscapeUndoManager.java ./undo/EmptyUndoManager.java ./view/EditGraphMode.java ./view/ReadOnlyGraphMode.java ./view/CytoscapeMenus.java ./visual/Network.java ./visual/OldStyleCalculatorIO.java ./visual/VisualMappingManager.java ./visual/tests/TestNewMappingsUI.java ./visual/ui/VizMapAttrTab.java ./visual/ui/VizMapUI.java ./actions/PrintAction.java ./actions/SetVisualPropertiesAction.java ./actions/HideSelectedNodesAction.java ./actions/HideSelectedEdgesAction.java ./actions/HideSelectedAction.java ./actions/LayoutAction.java ./actions/InvertSelectedEdgesAction.java ./actions/InvertSelectedNodesAction.java ./actions/LayoutSelectionAction.java ./actions/CircularLayoutAction.java ./actions/OrganicLayoutAction.java ./actions/RandomLayoutAction.java ./actions/EmbeddedLayoutAction.java ./actions/HierarchicalLayoutAction.java ./actions/AlignHorizontalAction.java ./actions/AlignVerticalAction.java ./actions/RotateSelectedNodesAction.java ./actions/ReduceEquivalentNodesAction.java ./actions/SaveVisibleNodesAction.java ./actions/AlphabeticalSelectionAction.java ./actions/ListFromFileSelectionAction.java ./actions/SaveSelectedNodesAction.java ./actions/DeselectAllAction.java ./actions/UndoAction.java ./actions/RedoAction.java ./actions/SelectFirstNeighborsAction.java ./actions/SaveAsInteractionsAction.java ./actions/SaveAsGMLAction.java ./actions/LoadGMLFileAction.java ./actions/LoadInteractionFileAction.java ./actions/ExpFileChooser.java ./actions/LoadExpressionMatrixAction.java ./actions/ZoomAction.java ./actions/LoadNodeAttributesAction.java ./actions/LoadEdgeAttributesAction.java ./actions/LoadBioDataServerAction.java ./actions/FitContentAction.java ./actions/ShowAllAction.java ./actions/ZoomSelectedAction.java ./actions/MainFilterDialogAction.java ./actions/MenuFilterAction.java
